text: @ShivAroor @pkrajeshpk And @MoHFW_INDIA @PMOIndia are he’ll bent on imports from China.  Why are we doing this is a mystery.  Country after country are reporting substandard quality of supply from China.  Let’s not pay after world got screwed by that very country spreading COVID19. Stop all imports
